segments.text: Good morning , this is Jane . This is Apple Co . Ltd .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello , Jane ! Is that the Human Resource Department ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had an interview with your company two weeks ago . I am calling to ask about the interview result . I hope you can give me a positive reply .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , the results have come out , and I can tell you ... Yes , I find your name . You are hired . Congratulations !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you ! I am glad to hear that . When would it be convenient for me to start working ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the starting salary for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your starting salary is 2500 yuan a month , and after you become a permanent employee , it will be higher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I appreciate the offer . I will come on time next Monday . See you then !
segments.speaker: S1
